entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C

Observed at: Burgeo 01:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
